gapAssessment.name: Gap Assessment
gapAssessment.description: A gap assessment identifies the differences between your current security posture and your desired compliance framework. We'll pinpoint exactly what you need to adjust to meet industry standards and achieve your compliance goals.

internalAudit.name: Internal Audit
internalAudit.description: Our internal audit services provide independent, objective assessment and consulting designed to add value and improve your organization's operations. Deliverables will include an Internal Audit Report, any required Non-Conformity Reports (NCRs), and assistance with creating Corrective Action Plans (CAPs) ready to provide to your external auditors.

phases.name: Analysis
phases.description: Evaluate findings and assess control effectiveness

phases.name: Reporting
phases.description: Document findings and create corrective action plans

auditPrep.name: Audit Prep
auditPrep.description: Let slackspace help you prepare for your external audit. We can help proactively gather responses and evidence that will be required for your audit. Walk in to your audit knowing your documentation and evidence are ready.

auditFacilitation.name: Audit Facilitation
auditFacilitation.description: Representing an organization to outside auditors is a special skill. Let slackspace represent you to your auditors and know that an experienced champion familiar with your controls is ready to confidently manage the audit engagement to completion. Slackspace will document any findings, NCRs, opportunities for improvement (OFIs) and assist with creating Corrective Action Plans (CAPs)

phases.name: Pre-Audit
phases.description: Coordinate with auditors and prepare team

phases.name: Audit Execution
phases.description: Facilitate audit activities and manage responses

phases.name: Finding Resolution
phases.description: Address audit findings and develop corrective actions

phases.name: Closure
phases.description: Complete audit process and implement improvements
